original_jd:
Job Description-

This role will blend business acumen with technical proficiency, requiring the ability to understand complex business processes and translate them into effective system configurations. You will be a key player in ensuring our systems accurately reflect business needs and operate efficiently. This position will focus heavily on the developing new processes with technical solutions with the vehicle configuration space. The position will utilize ML and AI to quickly develop solutions.

 • Collaborate with stakeholders across various departments to understand business needs, gather detailed requirements, and document them clearly and concisely using various techniques (e.g., user stories, use cases, process flows). 

• Translate business requirements into technical configurations within our [mention specific system] backend. This includes, but is not limited to:

 • Developing and maintaining configuration specifications.

 • Creating and modifying data mappings and integrations.

 • Implementing and testing new configurations.

 • Troubleshooting and resolving configuration-related issues. 

• Analyze existing data to identify trends, inefficiencies, and areas for improvement. This may involve querying databases, generating reports, and visualizing data using appropriate tools. 

• Identify opportunities to streamline business processes and improve system efficiency through configuration changes and best practices. 

• Thoroughly test configurations to ensure they meet requirements and function as expected. Participate in user acceptance testing (UAT). 

• Maintain comprehensive documentation of system configurations, processes, and troubleshooting steps. 

• Work closely with developers, IT support, and other stakeholders to ensure smooth implementation and ongoing support of system configurations.

Skills Required:

-Strong analytical and problem-solving skills. -Excellent communication, interpersonal, and collaboration skills. -Ability to translate complex technical information into easily understandable terms for non-technical audiences.

Skills Preferred:

-Java experience -SQL experience

Experience Required:

-ML experience and implementation experience

Experience Preferred:

-Experience with Agile methodologies is a plus. -Experience with vehicle configuration is a plus.
enhanced_versions:
Role Overview:
This role is a critical bridge between business needs and technical solutions, requiring a unique blend of business acumen and technical proficiency. As a key player in our organization, you will be responsible for ensuring our systems accurately reflect business requirements and operate efficiently. Your focus will be on developing new processes and leveraging cutting-edge technologies, such as machine learning (ML) and artificial intelligence (AI), to quickly deliver effective solutions within the vehicle configuration space.

Key Responsibilities:
- Collaborate closely with stakeholders across various departments to understand business needs, gather detailed requirements, and document them clearly and concisely using techniques like user stories, use cases, and process flows.
- Translate business requirements into technical configurations within our [mention specific system] backend, including developing and maintaining configuration specifications, creating and modifying data mappings and integrations, implementing and testing new configurations, and troubleshooting and resolving configuration-related issues.
- Analyze existing data to identify trends, inefficiencies, and areas for improvement, leveraging tools for querying databases, generating reports, and visualizing data.
- Identify opportunities to streamline business processes and improve system efficiency through configuration changes and the implementation of best practices.
- Thoroughly test configurations to ensure they meet requirements and function as expected, and participate in user acceptance testing (UAT).
- Maintain comprehensive documentation of system configurations, processes, and troubleshooting steps.
- Work closely with developers, IT support, and other stakeholders to ensure smooth implementation and ongoing support of system configurations.

Required Skills:
- Strong analytical and problem-solving skills to identify and address complex business challenges
- Excellent communication, interpersonal, and collaboration skills to effectively liaise with technical and non-technical stakeholders
- Ability to translate complex technical information into easily understandable terms for non-technical audiences
- Proficiency in SQL and experience working with databases

Preferred Skills:
- Hands-on experience with Java programming language
- Understanding of machine learning and artificial intelligence principles and their practical applications

Required Experience:
- Demonstrated experience in implementing and configuring complex enterprise systems, with a strong focus on vehicle configuration solutions
- Proven track record of successfully delivering technical solutions that address business needs

Preferred Experience:
- Experience working in an Agile development environment
- Familiarity with vehicle configuration processes and industry best practices

Tools & Technologies:
- [Mention specific system] backend
- SQL and database management tools
- Data visualization and reporting tools
- Agile project management tools

Work Environment & Expectations:
- Collaborative, cross-functional team environment with frequent stakeholder engagement
- Ability to work independently and as part of a larger team to drive projects to completion
- Willingness to stay up-to-date with the latest industry trends and technologies

Role Overview:
This role presents a unique opportunity to leverage your technical expertise and business acumen to drive innovation and efficiency within our vehicle configuration systems. As a key member of our team, you will be responsible for analyzing complex business requirements, translating them into effective technical solutions, and ensuring our systems operate at peak performance. Your ability to bridge the gap between business needs and technical capabilities will be instrumental in shaping the future of our vehicle configuration processes.

Key Responsibilities:
- Engage with stakeholders across various departments to thoroughly understand their business needs, gather detailed requirements, and document them using industry-standard techniques like user stories and use cases.
- Develop and maintain comprehensive configuration specifications for our [mention specific system] backend, ensuring the technical implementation aligns with business requirements.
- Create and modify data mappings and integrations to facilitate seamless data flow and information exchange between different systems.
- Implement and test new configurations, leveraging your technical expertise to identify and resolve any issues that arise.
- Analyze existing data to uncover trends, inefficiencies, and opportunities for improvement, using appropriate tools for querying databases, generating reports, and visualizing data.
- Proactively identify areas where business processes can be streamlined and system efficiency can be enhanced through configuration changes and the implementation of best practices.
- Thoroughly test configurations to verify they meet requirements and function as expected, and actively participate in user acceptance testing (UAT) to ensure end-user satisfaction.
- Maintain detailed documentation of system configurations, processes, and troubleshooting steps to support ongoing system maintenance and future enhancements.
- Collaborate closely with developers, IT support, and other stakeholders to ensure the smooth implementation and continuous support of system configurations.

Required Skills:
- Exceptional analytical and problem-solving abilities to tackle complex business challenges
- Strong communication, interpersonal, and collaboration skills to effectively liaise with technical and non-technical stakeholders
- Proficiency in translating technical information into clear, easily understandable terms for non-technical audiences
- Hands-on experience with SQL and database management

Preferred Skills:
- Familiarity with Java programming language and its application in enterprise-level systems
- Understanding of machine learning and artificial intelligence principles, and their potential to drive process improvements

Required Experience:
- Proven track record of successfully configuring and implementing complex enterprise systems, with a focus on vehicle configuration solutions
- Experience in gathering and documenting business requirements, and translating them into effective technical implementations

Preferred Experience:
- Working knowledge of Agile development methodologies and their benefits in delivering customer-centric solutions
- Familiarity with the vehicle configuration industry and its unique challenges and best practices

Tools & Technologies:
- [Mention specific system] backend
- SQL and database management tools
- Data visualization and reporting software
- Agile project management platforms

Work Environment & Expectations:
- Collaborative, cross-functional team environment that encourages innovation and continuous improvement
- Ability to work independently and as part of a larger team to drive projects to successful completion
- Commitment to staying up-to-date with the latest industry trends and technological advancements

Role Overview:
This role offers a unique opportunity to leverage your technical expertise and business acumen to drive transformative change within our vehicle configuration systems. As a key member of our team, you will be responsible for analyzing complex business requirements, translating them into cutting-edge technical solutions, and ensuring our systems operate at the highest levels of efficiency and performance. Your ability to bridge the gap between business needs and technological capabilities will be instrumental in shaping the future of our vehicle configuration processes and driving our organization forward.

Key Responsibilities:
- Collaborate closely with stakeholders across various departments to thoroughly understand their business needs, gather detailed requirements, and document them using industry-standard techniques like user stories, use cases, and process flows.
- Develop and maintain comprehensive configuration specifications for our [mention specific system] backend, ensuring the technical implementation seamlessly aligns with the evolving business requirements.
- Create and modify data mappings and integrations to facilitate the smooth flow of information between disparate systems, enabling efficient data exchange and decision-making.
- Implement and test new configurations, leveraging your technical expertise to identify and resolve any issues that arise, while continuously exploring ways to optimize system performance.
- Analyze existing data to uncover trends, inefficiencies, and opportunities for improvement, using advanced tools and techniques for querying databases, generating insightful reports, and visualizing data in a meaningful way.
- Proactively identify areas where business processes can be streamlined and system efficiency can be enhanced through the strategic application of configuration changes and the implementation of industry-leading best practices.
- Thoroughly test configurations to verify they meet requirements and function as expected, and actively lead user acceptance testing (UAT) to ensure end-user satisfaction and seamless system adoption.
- Maintain comprehensive documentation of system configurations, processes, and troubleshooting steps to support ongoing system maintenance and future enhancements.
- Collaborate closely with developers, IT support, and other stakeholders to ensure the smooth implementation and continuous support of system configurations, while also serving as a trusted technical advisor and mentor.

Required Skills:
- Exceptional analytical and problem-solving abilities to tackle complex business challenges and devise innovative solutions
- Highly effective communication, interpersonal, and collaboration skills to engage with technical and non-technical stakeholders at all levels
- Proven expertise in translating complex technical information into clear, easily understandable terms for non-technical audiences
- Proficiency in SQL and database management, with the ability to leverage data-driven insights to drive process improvements

Preferred Skills:
- Hands-on experience with Java programming language and its application in enterprise-level systems
- Comprehensive understanding of machine learning and artificial intelligence principles, and their practical implementation to enhance system efficiency and decision-making

Required Experience:
- Extensive track record of successfully configuring and implementing complex enterprise systems, with a strong focus on vehicle configuration solutions
- Demonstrated experience in gathering and documenting business requirements, and translating them into effective technical implementations that drive tangible business outcomes

Preferred Experience:
- Familiarity with Agile development methodologies and their benefits in delivering customer-centric, iterative solutions
- In-depth knowledge of the vehicle configuration industry, its unique challenges, and best practices for optimizing processes and systems

Tools & Technologies:
- [Mention specific system] backend
- SQL and advanced data analysis tools
- Data visualization and reporting software
- Agile project management platforms

Work Environment & Expectations:
- Collaborative, cross-functional team environment that encourages innovation, continuous learning, and knowledge sharing
- Ability to work independently and as part of a larger team to drive complex projects to successful completion
- Commitment to staying at the forefront of industry trends and technological advancements, and proactively exploring ways to apply them to drive organizational transformation
